About Me

I am a passionate and committed Information Technology professional with a robust background in programming and web development. Holding a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, I have developed a solid foundation in various programming languages and modern web technologies. My professional journey has equipped me with practical experience in software development, where I’ve honed my skills in creating efficient, user-friendly solutions. I have a keen interest in conceptualizing and developing innovative ideas that can have a meaningful impact. I enjoy exploring new technologies and brainstorming ways to apply them in practical, valuable ways. Driven by a desire to stay at the forefront of technological advancements, I am enthusiastic about applying my expertise to innovative projects. My career goal is to contribute meaningfully to cutting-edge initiatives while continuously broadening my technical knowledge and skills. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can tackle challenging problems and collaborate with talented teams to drive technological progress.

Skills

HTML & CSS

Utilizing HTML and CSS, I’ve effectively built well-structured and visually cohesive web interfaces. CSS’s advanced features, like Flexbox and Grid, have empowered me to implement modern, adaptive designs that enhance the overall user experience.

JavaScript

Developing games with JavaScript has proven its effectiveness in crafting responsive and engaging web-based games. Its compatibility with various tools and frameworks has streamlined development, while the ease of integrating with web technologies has broadened the scope of game features.

Java

Java’s consistent performance and comprehensive API support have been crucial in developing complex and cross-platform applications. Its structured approach and powerful tools have enhanced my ability to write clean, maintainable code.

PHP

PHP's ease of integration with databases and its widespread use in web development have made it a versatile tool for creating dynamic websites and applications. Its rich set of built-in functions and strong community support have significantly accelerated my development process.

C

C's straightforward syntax and powerful features have enabled me to tackle complex programming challenges and optimize performance-critical tasks. Working with C has reinforced my understanding of fundamental programming concepts and strengthened my problem-solving skills.

C#

Using C# for projects like desktop and web applications has showcased its versatility and power. The language’s comprehensive tooling and strong support for asynchronous programming have enhanced both development speed and application performance.

C++

I have a strong understanding of C++ programming, including object-oriented principles like classes and inheritance, as well as memory management techniques such as pointers and dynamic allocation. I am skilled in using control flow structures and functions to build efficient and modular code.

Laravel

Working with Laravel has demonstrated its effectiveness in building scalable and maintainable web solutions. The framework’s emphasis on clean code practices and robust ecosystem has enabled me to create dynamic and feature-rich applications with ease.

CodeIgniter

In my experience with CodeIgniter, I’ve found its intuitive setup and streamlined MVC architecture to be invaluable for rapidly developing efficient web applications. The framework’s ease of use and robust set of features have significantly accelerated my development process.

SQL

Working with SQL has provided me with a solid foundation in data manipulation and retrieval, allowing me to design and implement effective database schemas and queries. Its versatility in managing data and performing transactions has been essential for building data-driven applications.

MariaDB

Using MariaDB has allowed me to leverage its high-performance capabilities and rich set of tools for efficient database management and optimization. The ease of migration from MySQL and its strong community support have made it a reliable choice for my data-driven projects.

Angular

Working with Angular has enabled me to build dynamic and responsive web applications using its powerful data-binding and component-based architecture. The framework's comprehensive tooling and modular approach have streamlined development and improved code maintainability.

Python

Python’s readability and extensive libraries have been instrumental in my ability to quickly develop and prototype applications. Whether for data analysis, web development, or scripting, Python’s versatility and ease of use have made it a go-to language for various tasks.

Projects

GPS Target Place JAVA (Freelance)

An Android app that leverages GPS-based alarms and navigation alerts to help users reach their destinations safely. It features preventive measures for drivers and incorporates advanced technologies to enhance travel safety and efficiency.

Online Farmers Marketplace Trading (Informatics Capstone 2)

Utilizes PHP, Composer, and YOLOv4 for advanced image recognition to enhance agricultural transactions. This system improves accessibility, efficiency, and inventory management by leveraging cutting-edge technology to streamline product identification and categorization.

CRUD (Freelance)

A CodeIgniter-based CRUD application using the MVC pattern for efficient database management and clear code organization, enhancing maintainability.

University Handbook JAVA and Swift (Freelance)

Provides comprehensive and up-to-date information on academic policies and resources through a unified platform available on both Android and iOS. This app serves as a central reference guide to enhance university operations, ensuring easy access and streamlined navigation for students, faculty, and staff.

SQL Dumping (Informatics)

Specializes in database management and SQL dumping for creating backup copies, ensuring data integrity and availability for migration and restoration.

Web 2 Project (Informatics)

Developed interactive JavaScript games focusing on engaging user experiences with responsive design for smooth performance across browsers.

Swine Safe Java (Freelance)

Java-based Android app using image recognition to detect swine diseases, track health and breeding schedules, and map affected areas to enhance herd management.

Grading System C# (Informatics)

A C# app for managing student grades and records, featuring grade input, average calculations, and report card generation to streamline the grading process.
